Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client.ClientController
public class ClientController extends Object
The ClientController class is used on client side to remember: the client's UserInterface choice and ClientAction, and the current connection status
